data.name: helpCommand
data.value:
🌈 Welcome to the world of Tamagotchi! 🌈 Here you can get a new virtual friend 🐩🐈🐈‍⬛🐕 Make sure to keep an eye on your pet’s progress: ▫️ play mini-games with it ⚽️ ▫️ feed it tasty treats 🍕🍳🍫 ▫️ take care of it 🍼 ▫️ groom and simply love it 😻
In the commands menu, you’ll find everything your pet needs 🌻 Visit your pet often, because it loves you too and will be happy to play 🤍❤️🤍
FAQ:
How is level earned 🏅?
1 XP = 1 minute of pet’s life. Just remember your pet 🦩
How to earn money 💰?
Gold is earned by working (/work)
Can the pet die 💀?
Unfortunately, just like in real life, a pet in Tamagotchi can get very upset and leave 💔 So visit your virtual friend often 🧸
How to get Diamonds 💎?
For now, only via the referral program (/referal) or by ranking in the TOP-3 pets by level at the end of the month.
Every month my pet’s levels reset. Why?
Yes, each month pet levels reset. Pets in the TOP-10 get prizes. TOP-3 get both gold💰 and diamonds💎!
How does the AUTO-FEEDER work?
On the Farm you can turn the auto-feeder on/off. If turned on, the pet feeds itself every 4 hours (SATIETY can even exceed 100) and consumes one charge. You can recharge the auto-feeder on the Farm.
/ menu – here are almost all possible commands

data.name: menuCommand
data.value: What to do with pet: /pet - pet's status {0} /kitchen - feed your pet 🍕 /work - to earn more gold 💰 /sleep - bedroom 🧸 /gameroom entertainments 🎳 /ranks - see the best pets! 👑 /hospital - cure your pet 🏥 /bathroom - clean your pet 🛁 /referal - referral program 👩‍👩‍👧‍👦 /rename - to change name 🌀 /reward - to earn daily bonus 🎁 /changelog - official channel of Tamagotchi bot 🚀 /language - language 🇺🇸 | język 🇵🇱 | мова 🇨🇷 | язык 🇷🇺 /help - FAQ 🆘 There will be more in future! Stay tuned! 💝

data.name: FarewellText
data.value: You have come to {0}, but all you see is an empty room and a note on the table: "My beloved friend {1}! It was very nice to spend time with you, but I've started feel not good. You should have kept an eye on me...❤️‍🩹" Your pet left because he lacked care 💔 ⚠️ WARNING: IF YOU DO NOTHING, YOU WILL LOSE YOUR PET ☠️ You have: {2} 💰 gold {3} 💎 diamonds

data.name: EpilogueText
data.value:
It happens to everyone, but life goes on! Maybe you'll be lucky with a new pet 😼
Try again? 🫶

data.name: ReminderNotifyText1
data.value:
{0}: You've come back! I've missed you so much! I want to eat 🌭 and play with you 🪁
/kitchen to feed 🍩 /gameroom for games 🏓

data.name: appleGameHelpText
data.value: The rules of the game are simple: the one who eats an unripe green apple will lose. You can choose to eat one 🍎, two 🍎🍎 or three 🍎🍎🍎 apples at a time Can you outplay your pet and leave him a tasteless 🍏?

data.name: appleGameUndefiendText
data.value: Choose one 🍎, two 🍎🍎 or three 🍎🍎🍎 apples to eat

data.name: appleGameLoseText
data.value:
Your green apple remains
{0}: Better luck next time 😉

data.name: tooTiredText
data.value: Your pet is too tired, he should sleep 💤

data.name: changelog_onPatch_17
data.value: ⚡️⚡️ Update 1.7 Released ⚡️⚡️ NEW: 🧸 Added new pet types: 🐒 Adorable Monkey 🐯 Brutal Tiger Cub 🦁 Majestic Lion Cub Lion and Tiger Cub are purchased once, so after buying you can switch back to their look for free 🎓 Education – there are different levels of education; you need to study each in order 💡 New jobs, which depend on the pet’s education 💎 New currency added – DIAMONDS💎. Can be earned by inviting friends to play Tamagotchi via the referral program ⚽️ New games in the Kids Room – ❌⭕️ Tic-Tac-Toe and Hangman [RU] (Word Builder) 😵 🏆 New Rankings added 📆 Monthly Level Ranking Update – now every month pets reset their levels. Prizes 🎁 are awarded for making it into the TOP-10 for the month 🤖 Auto-Feeder added – a device that feeds your pet while you are offline. Purchasable only with diamonds💎 CHANGES: 🍽 Satiety balance changed 💰 Jobs – earnings and waiting times changed 🛏 Bedroom – sleep duration reduced from 10 minutes to 2 minutes 🌻 Many more changes that I forgot, but you will see them in the bot :) For now, I’ve paused work on the graphical interface, but decided to compensate with new fun features 🦩 🎄HAPPY HOLIDAYS TO EVERYONE!🎄 May the New Year bring more happiness and luck, may problems and negativity stay away, may your dreams come true. Have a great holiday season and Happy New Year! ⭐️

data.name: Referal_Ads_changelog
data.value: 👫 We remind you about the referral program 👭 It's more fun together, so invite your friends to join us in 🐾Tamagotchi🐾 Virtual GPT Pet🐾 You can get {0}💰 and {1}💎 for every new friend! ➡️/referal Subscribe to our channel, where everything is about the bot: https://t.me/newsvirtualpetbot
